channel.title: Questions
channel.description:
I'm using Delta.
1. When I go to the wilderness, the wildy sign shows but after like 1 second, it goes away. It doesn't show anymore. How can I fix this ?
2. How can I make the "Run" unlimited ?
Thanks.

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=j19283746 link=topic=443242.msg3254768#msg3254768 date=1278026888]
Type the Infinite sign where the run is. Thats the way mine is setup.
[/quote]
That would only display the text.

To solve the issue, you’re going to need to find your ‘running energy’ method.
I’m not sure what the method is, as I don’t code Delta, but I’m giving you the general idea.

Once you find the method, remove the method that causes the energy to decrease, when the action ID of the run button is selected to true.

If you have no clue what this means, let me download a Delta base, and I’ll start searching, or allow someone else to further help you.

As for the Wilderness sign, this could be two reasons:
Client’s draw-sprite method is messed up for the Wilderness sign, or the Server’s method for displaying it isn’t correct.

Hope this helps.[/quote]

Thank you.

I think that the sign problem is server side because the sign is working on client.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:
